name: Worm Hunter 1.0
description:
Hi! I am a new developer from Sweden who has only made a few scratch and python games. Thank you for playing! 

The game can also be played from the original source:

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/244207708/fullscreen/

Worm Hunter is a survival game where you have to, as the hunter, crush the worm intruders before eating the unfortunately but uncoincidentally placed salad basket, with a bat. 

The game comes in waves or stages that are hard coded but with slight randomization, such as where worms spawn initially. Each wave increases the difficulty.
